title: #15 Basics of Non-Verbal Hypnosis
description:
Learn how to use the non-verbal techniques in Dr. Paret's lesson. Dr. Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism. His students demonstrate that  with non-verbal techniques  you can achieve everything you want. These and numerous other proprietary techniques are taught exclusively in our school.
